ovdesc.p: This table is used to setup preferred correspondents that a company uses to route a payment to specific country. More than one preferred correspondent for a country can be provided on the basis of the currency of the transaction and routing group.
Preferred correspondents are also known as country correspondent.
For any payment, if PREF set-up does not provide a preferred correspondent, then Routing & Settlement is not possible with PREF option and the payments hub marks "Alternative for R & S not possible"
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.PREFERREDCORRESPONDENT

desc.p: Indicates if the preferred correspondent is identified using a National Clearing Code or BIC.
